Job Title: Lead CAD

Location: The Woodlands, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Location: The Woodlands, TX, United States, 77381

Company: Chart Industries

Ensuring Chart’s Success…

“Cooler By Design”- Chart’s principal focus is the design and fabrication of cryogenic equipment; so, you can see where we get our tagline from, right? Well, yes and no – see, we think the stuff we design, and build is pretty cool too. What’s more, we’re problem solvers. Customers don’t come to Chart with an equipment specification, they come to Chart with a challenge. That’s where you come in, because someone has to figure it out, all the way from conceptual design to installation and commissioning of equipment at site. The applications we service are pretty diverse (and cool) too – from solutions for launching rockets into space; to providing low carbon energy for vehicles, industries and even entire communities; to the preservation of critical human and animal tissue. Pop into a well-known fast-food outlet and it’ll likely be Chart equipment supplying your carbonated beverage. If nitro coffee or nitro ice cream is your thing – well, that’s Chart technology too (and it’s also cool)! Interested to learn more? Take a tour ofChart Cityto get a feel of how Chart equipment solutions impact our daily lives.

Chart Industries is looking for a Lead CAD for our office in The Woodlands, TX .The successful candidate will assist in providing quality P&IDs from Engineering sketches for internal use and to be issued to the client. They will also assist in providing mechanical design and detail drawings requires for use in shop fabrication as directed by their supervisor.

What Your Day-to-Day Activities Will Be…

Work with engineering disciplines (PFD’s) and project management to review input information require for proper process flow diagrams (PFS’s) and piping and instruments diagrams (P&IDs)Redline DrawingsSpecificationsHeat and Material BalancesData sheetsOutside Vendor documentsReview of 3D models if availableDevelop drawings delivery schedules with project management and engineering managementReview work requirements and assign work to the appropriate CAD Designer/DrafterDevelop estimates for project work hours for CAD/DraftersAdhere to document design standards for drawing qualityUse of AutoCAD &SmartPlant P&IDs and SmartPlant Instrumentation softwarePrepare quality P&IDs and Process Flow DiagramsReview drawings produced by designers and drafters:Verify that drawing specifications and standards are being maintainedCheck comments and redlines by engineering disciplines to verify all marks have been appropriately picked up

Your Education Should Be…

Associate degree, or 2 years college3+ years related experienceExperience in leading a small CAD/Design team

Your Professional Experience Should Be…

Capable of working with AutoCADProficient with drawing P&IDs within SmartPlant P&ID environmentProficient with the use of BluebeamKnowledge of SmartPlant InstrumentationAbility to work independently and proceed with objectives from supervisor and Project ManagementKnowledgeable with P&ID standards (such as ISA, ISO, PIP standards)

Chart is an equal opportunity employer

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
